course_title: Quality Coaching: Understanding, Informing and Advancing Practice

learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate an awareness and understanding of the concept of quality coaching and the associated pedagogical aspects of coaches work;
Demonstrate an awareness and understanding of coaches roles in the learning of athletes;
Demonstrate an awareness and understanding of the centrality of learning to coaching practice.

assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit via the relevant Turnitin submission portal on the course Blackboard site.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

learning_activities.topic:
Getting started

Review of coaching practice and introductions (week 1)
learning_activities.topic_description: Getting started Review of coaching practice and introductions (week 1)

learning_activities.learning_period: Multiple weeksFrom Week 2 To Week 4(03 Mar - 23 Mar)
learning_activities.topic:
Coaches' work

Seminar and readings (week 2) followed by online discussion (week 3); and the preparation and submission of coach responses to the seminar questions (due Friday, end of week 4).
learning_activities.topic_description: Coaches' work Seminar and readings (week 2) followed by online discussion (week 3); and the preparation and submission of coach responses to the seminar questions (due Friday, end of week 4).

learning_activities.learning_period: Multiple weeksFrom Week 5 To Week 7(24 Mar - 13 Apr)
learning_activities.topic:
Coaches as educators

Seminar and readings (week 5) followed by online discussion (week 6); and the preparation and submission of coach responses to the seminar questions (due end of week 7).
learning_activities.topic_description: Coaches as educators Seminar and readings (week 5) followed by online discussion (week 6); and the preparation and submission of coach responses to the seminar questions (due end of week 7).

learning_activities.learning_period: Multiple weeksFrom Week 8 To Week 10(14 Apr - 11 May)
learning_activities.topic:
Coaches as learners

Seminar and readings (week 8) followed by online discussion (week 9); and the preparation and submission of student responses to the seminar questions (due Friday, end of week 10)
